pkgmetadata.longdescription: lcd-stuff is a client for app-misc/lcdproc written in C. It features displaying of e-mail using POP3 and IMAP, mpd control, news items using RSS, display of the weather from weather.com and it can fill your MP3 player with directory and file names based on the title.

use.flag: Add support for display of mpd controlled music (media-libs/libmpd)
